Added_Other.purpose: Improves stability and functionality of Lua apps on Roblox.

Added_Other.name: FFlagLuauOccursCheckInCommit
Added_Other.mechanism: Implements checks during code commits in the Luau scripting language.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves code reliability, leading to a smoother gameplay experience for players.

Added_Other.name: FFlagLuauRefineDistributesOverUnions
Added_Other.mechanism: Improves how the Luau scripting language handles unions in code.
Added_Other.purpose: Enhances script performance and reliability for developers using unions.

Added_Other.name: FFlagMigrateEmptyResultsViewToFoundation
Added_Other.mechanism: Updates the display for empty search results to a new system.
Added_Other.purpose: Provides a cleaner and more user-friendly experience when no results are found.

Added_Other.name: FFlagOnlyVisibleFramesAllowModal
Added_Other.mechanism: Restricts modal pop-ups to only visible frames in the UI.
Added_Other.purpose: Prevents interruptions in gameplay by ensuring modals don't appear in hidden areas.

Added_Other.name: FFlagPassTextAlignmentRelevancyInfo_Staged
Added_Other.mechanism: Updates how text alignment information is processed in the game.
Added_Other.purpose: Ensures better text display and alignment for a clearer user interface.

Added_Other.name: FFlagPerfDataOnTelemetryV2
Added_Other.mechanism: Implements a new version of performance data tracking for better insights.
Added_Other.purpose: Helps developers optimize game performance, leading to a smoother experience for players.

Added_Other.name: FFlagPerformanceTelemetryHandleSpuriousWake
Added_Other.mechanism: Improves how the system handles unexpected wake events to maintain performance.
Added_Other.purpose: Reduces lag and improves responsiveness during gameplay.

Added_Other.name: FFlagPlaceVersionHistoryMetadataRCC_Staged
Added_Other.mechanism: Stores version history data for places in a staged format.
Added_Other.purpose: Allows players to view and revert to previous versions of a game.

Added_Other.name: FFlagProfilePlatformEnableChipSocialRow_v6_IXP
Added_Other.mechanism: Activates a new social feature row on user profiles for better connectivity.
Added_Other.purpose: Facilitates easier access to social features, helping players connect with friends.

Added_Other.name: FFlagReCacheIconsOnThemeChange
Added_Other.mechanism: Updates and refreshes icon caches when the theme changes.
Added_Other.purpose: Ensures players see the correct icons that match the current theme.

Added_Other.name: FFlagRefactorIsTopBarFocused
Added_Other.mechanism: Changes how the top bar's focus state is managed in the user interface.
Added_Other.purpose: Enhances navigation and usability of the top bar for players.

Added_Other.name: FFlagRemoveLeaveShortcutFromLeaveConfirm
Added_Other.mechanism: Removes the shortcut option to leave from the confirmation dialog.
Added_Other.purpose: Reduces accidental game exits, keeping players engaged longer.

Added_Other.name: FFlagRemoveRespawnShortcutFromRespawnConfirmation
Added_Other.mechanism: Removes the quick respawn option from the confirmation screen.
Added_Other.purpose: Encourages players to think about their respawn choices, adding a strategic element to gameplay.

Added_Other.name: FFlagReverbAbsorptionField
Added_Other.mechanism: Introduces a new audio feature that simulates sound absorption in environments.
Added_Other.purpose: Creates a more immersive sound experience for players in different game settings.

Added_Other.name: FFlagReverbAbsorptionFieldFileFormat
Added_Other.mechanism: Changes the file format for reverb absorption fields in audio.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves audio quality and realism in games by better handling sound effects.

Added_Other.name: FFlagSelfieConsentDialogDontUsePortal
Added_Other.mechanism: Changes the way consent is requested for taking selfies in the game.
Added_Other.purpose: Players have a clearer and more direct way to give or deny permission for selfies.

Added_Other.name: FFlagSelfieConsentDontMountUnused
Added_Other.mechanism: Prevents unnecessary components from loading if not needed.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves game performance by reducing load times.

Added_Other.name: FFlagUnsyncBreakpointsInClonedScripts
Added_Other.mechanism: Allows breakpoints in cloned scripts to function independently.
Added_Other.purpose: Enhances debugging capabilities for developers, making it easier to fix issues.

Added_Other.name: FFlagUpdateViewportOnUse3DPanelsChanged
Added_Other.mechanism: Updates the game view when 3D panels are used.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves the visual experience by ensuring the game view reflects changes in 3D panels.

Added_Other.name: FFlagVideoEncoderScopedOutputBuffer_Staged
Added_Other.mechanism: Implements a more efficient video encoding process for streaming.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves video quality and reduces lag during gameplay streaming.

Added_Other.name: FFlagVideoWinEncodeSampleTracking
Added_Other.mechanism: Enhances video encoding by tracking sample data more effectively.
Added_Other.purpose: Improves video quality and performance for players watching in-game videos.

Added_Other.name: FStringTutorialUpsellPlaceId

Added_Camera/UI.purpose: Enhances communication by allowing players to convert spoken words into text.

Added_Camera/UI.name: FFlagAXMigrateQuickButtonsToGlobalAutoFocus
Added_Camera/UI.mechanism: Moves quick action buttons to a global focus system for better accessibility.
Added_Camera/UI.purpose: Enhances user experience by allowing players to quickly access buttons without extra clicks.

Added_Camera/UI.name: FFlagAXQuickButtonsFrameShouldAlwaysExist
Added_Camera/UI.mechanism: Ensures a frame for quick buttons is always present in the UI.
Added_Camera/UI.purpose: Provides players with consistent access to quick action buttons.

Added_Camera/UI.name: FFlagAXSavePreviousPageFromQuickMenu
Added_Camera/UI.mechanism: Saves the last page visited in the quick menu for easier access.
Added_Camera/UI.purpose: Allows players to quickly return to their last used menu page without navigating through all options.

Added_Camera/UI.name: FFlagCommunicationsFixLastInputMode
Added_Camera/UI.mechanism: Fixes how the last input mode is tracked during gameplay.
Added_Camera/UI.purpose: Ensures that player controls work correctly, enhancing gameplay fluidity.

Added_Camera/UI.name: FFlagCorrectGuiStateMouseDownAndroid

Added_Camera/UI.purpose: Improves user interface responsiveness for Android players.

Added_Camera/UI.name: FFlagEnableAutomaticGainControlForAudioDeviceInput
Added_Camera/UI.purpose: Ensures consistent audio quality during voice chats.

Added_Camera/UI.name: FFlagEnableNoiseReductionForAudioDeviceInput
Added_Camera/UI.mechanism: Activates noise reduction features for audio input devices.
Added_Camera/UI.purpose: Enhances voice clarity during in-game communication for players.

Added_Camera/UI.name: FFlagEnableSpatialUIScalingFix
Added_Camera/UI.mechanism: Adjusts how UI scales in different spatial contexts.
Added_Camera/UI.purpose: Ensures UI elements display correctly across various devices and settings.

Added_Camera/UI.name: FFlagSduiComponentSkipParseLocalProps
Added_Camera/UI.mechanism: Optimizes the processing of UI components by skipping unnecessary local property parsing.
Added_Camera/UI.purpose: Improves UI performance, leading to a smoother experience for players.

Added_Camera/UI.name: FFlagUIBloxFixModalBottomSheetSelectable
Added_Camera/UI.mechanism: Fixes issues with selecting items in modal bottom sheets within the UI framework.
Added_Camera/UI.purpose: Enhances user interaction and experience when using modal dialogs.

Added_Camera/UI.name: FFlagUIBloxTruncateExperienceTileMetadataTextFooter
Added_Camera/UI.mechanism: Truncates long text in the footer of experience tiles to fit better.
Added_Camera/UI.purpose: Improves the visual layout by preventing text overflow, making it easier for players to read.

Added_Camera/UI.name: FFlagUIEditorActionURI

Added_Camera/UI.purpose: Facilitates easier navigation and usage of the UI editor for developers.

Added_Camera/UI.name: FFlagUKOSALegacyReportMenu_Staged

Added_Camera/UI.purpose: Allows players to report issues using a familiar interface.

Added_Physics.name: DFFlagSolverV2CleanupPendingModelStreamingModeModels
Added_Physics.mechanism: Cleans up models that are pending in streaming mode more efficiently.

Added_Physics.name: FFlagSolverV2RefactorReplicationStateUpdate

Added_Physics.purpose: Improves the accuracy and speed of game updates for a smoother experience.

Added_Physics.name: FIntOcclusionSolverInitialMaxSearchIterations

Added_Physics.purpose: Improves rendering performance by optimizing how objects are displayed based on visibility.

Added_World.name: DFIntISRInstanceBlockTimeoutWorldSteps
Added_World.mechanism: Sets a timeout for instance blocking in the game world.
Added_World.purpose: Improves game performance by preventing long delays when instances are blocked.

Added_Input.name: FFlagAXDisableGamepadPanning
Added_Input.mechanism: Disables the panning feature when using gamepads.
Added_Input.purpose: Improves control for players using gamepads, making gameplay more precise.

Added_Input.name: FFlagEnableAppNavGamepadRemoval
Added_Input.mechanism: Removes gamepad navigation options from the app interface.
Added_Input.purpose: Simplifies navigation for players who do not use gamepads.

Added_Graphics.name: FFlagBuyActionBarShouldNotUnrenderInFullscreenMode

Added_Graphics.name: FStringTextureTranscodeFidelityETC
Added_Graphics.mechanism: Enhances the process of converting texture fidelity for better visuals.
Added_Graphics.purpose: Delivers higher quality textures for a more immersive gaming experience.

Added_Network.name: FFlagCreateConnectionInternalEarlierServer
Added_Network.mechanism: Creates server connections earlier in the process.
Added_Network.purpose: Improves the speed of server connections, leading to a smoother gameplay experience.

Added_Network.name: FFlagEnableClientSettingAPIInProduction_IXP

Added_Network.name: FFlagFixHapticWaveformReplication
